column4: Hi guys, I need some help with Grub2 on Karmic, have to boot manually through rescue grub2 console commands
may want to search for grub2 config file(s) editing
granted this should have happened. Updating grub from one type to another is getting cute, I would reinstall unless your interested in figuring it all out.
I thought it would be easy since there is a bug report, saying that overwriting wubldr file with a patched version, booting manually and then update-grub would fix the problem
